item.description: Tomasz Pawłowski e-mail: tomasz.pawlowski@tutanota.com portfolio: github.com/NiebieskiRekin About me My interests include Linux and electronics projects with the Arduino. I aspire to become a Backend developer or a DevOps engineer. People call me a tidy-minded, calm and self-disciplined person. Studying is the element of mine, I absorb knowledge quickly. Skills ⌨️ C/C++ Python PostgreSQL Git Java Android Kotlin 🖥️ Linux DevOps Bash Docker Ansible Traefik GitHub Actions AWS Google Cloud 🌐 Polish - Native speaker English - C1 (ACERT) French - B2 (DELF) German - A2
